data.name: My Lovely Wife - Artbook
data.detailed_description: The My Lovely Wife artbook gives our fans a window into the world of Jake and his Succubus consorts. Our artbook aims to give players the most in depth understanding of My Lovely Wife possible along with insights into the design and creation process while sharing early sketches, ideas, and imaginings. We are incredibly proud to share with you this exploration into our dark and beautiful game.
data.about_the_game: The My Lovely Wife artbook gives our fans a window into the world of Jake and his Succubus consorts. Our artbook aims to give players the most in depth understanding of My Lovely Wife possible along with insights into the design and creation process while sharing early sketches, ideas, and imaginings. We are incredibly proud to share with you this exploration into our dark and beautiful game.
data.short_description: Enjoy a glimpse behind the curtains and witness the gothic majesty of My Lovely Wife.

content_descriptors.notes: My Lovely Wife features an array of succubus whose goals are to tempt mortals. There forms are designed to entice and delight and some may find them overly suggestive.
